basic_information.scholarship_notes: Will rotate spendable between CLA and CFAD each year.

description: This scholarship was established in 1992 in honor of UCO alumnus Dale Edward McConathy. Eligibility Art major Cumulative GPA 2.5+ Sophomore, junior, senior or graduate student 12+ completed hours at UCO Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
